Text: Can anybody confirm this is okay? I've downloaded this movie like 3 times and the first was a 1080p with broken audio, the second was too damn dark and the third was a HD China rip that had everything wrong... how's this one?

Audio is brutally clipped and distorted in loud scenes like on almost all "BRRiPs" of this movie, probably derived from a screener or something. A: 4/10. People giving this 10/10 on audio have no idea. Video is also clipped (black bars at top/bottom) and has significant color loss. V: 8/10
